justification: "Participants not only make a prediction but also express a confidence level … In the experimental paradigm, confidence levels are chosen from a small set of labels, r ∈ {low, medium, high}."

measured_by: probability of switching to the AI recommendation (α parameter / switching proportion)
justification: "The key latent variable of interest in the model is α, which determines the willingness of the participant … to switch to the AI's recommended prediction if it differs from their own prediction."
construct: reliance on AI advice / advice-taking policy

measured_by: ability parameter a_i estimated with a three-parameter Item Response Theory model
justification: "The person parameter a_i is an ability parameter that determines the overall performance of the person across items" within the "three-parameter IRT model."
